displayName.description: the display name of the facet

options.description: the list of available options for this facet

code.description: the code for this facet, to be passed back to APIs that allow faceted filtering

name.description: the displayed name of the facet option

categoryLevel.description: the depth level of the category, if applicable

showBadges.description: true; if badges should be shown

sortOptions.description: the list of available sort options

subcategoryCallouts.description: the list of subcategory callouts to display

totalNumProducts.description: the total number of available products for this query

categoryId.description: the unique ID of the linked category

linkToLandingPage.description: true; if this nav link should direct to the CLP view instead of the PLP view
